channel.title: Book and author podcasts
channel.itunes:subtitle: Book publisher and author podcasts: news, interviews and readings
channel.itunes:author: Talking Bookshelf
channel.itunes:summary: Talking Bookshelf broadcasts podcasts from publishers and authors about their latest books. Podcasts include interviews and actors reading extracts from the latest books.
channel.description: Talking Bookshelf broadcasts podcasts from publishers and authors about their latest books. Podcasts include interviews and actors reading extracts from the latest books.
channel.itunes:keywords: book podcasts, books, author podcasts, publishers, writers, publishing

item.title: Matador: A serious podcast about self-publishing
item.itunes:author: Talking Bookshelf
item.itunes:subtitle: Podcast about quality self-publishing for authors
item.itunes:summary: Meet three people who have recently published their books with Matador. They talk about how self-publishing with Matador has worked for them. Also, hear Publisher Jeremy Thompson talk about self-publishing with Matador, and why their emphasis on high quality sets them apart.

item.title: Detective thriller: Pancardi's Pride By Ron Clooney

item.itunes:subtitle: Author Ron Clooney talks about his thriller Pancardi's Pride
item.itunes:summary: Author Ron Clooney talks about his thriller Pancardi's Pride. Includes an actor reading extracts from the novel.
item.itunes:keywords: books, authors, publishers, writers, publishing, Ron Clooney
